Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 50th overall pick, by Coney Island in 1970...
Injured on 8/28/1971 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 7/20/1974 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Coney Island to Boston (UBA) on 1/31/1975 (Going to PIL: P R. Emert, P O. Reaves, P A. Lent, P R. Poli. Going to CI: P B. Clark)...
Injured on 5/9/1975 with a Swollen Ear, out for one week...
Injured on 8/31/1975 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/30/1978...
Injured on 5/7/1980 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/4/1985 to a 4-year deal worth $3,164,000 per year...
